entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
